body: @rsc it seems that by the authors' own benchmarks, Errol is 2.4x slower than Grisu3. Does that seem like a reasonable tradeoff for strconv? (I ask because I'm thinking of working on this but I anticipate pushback if the change makes the 95.5% case more than twice as slow. Another alternative would be to use Errol as the Grisu3 fallback but that seems like a lot of code for printing floats.)
